page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: We carried out a survey of farming in this area. We found that the farms in the area are very simalar. None of the farmers had{arable}land , this is because of the short summers and cool climate in this part of the country. We also found that all of the farmers use all of the land for{grass. Some of the grass is used for{fodder {crops}such as hay or silage. The next thing we investigated was the farm livestock.{Sheep}were most popular because of the climate and poor soils, closely followed by{beef {cattle}.There are also a few{poultry}, and occasionally a{horse}but no pigs. We found that the major products which the farmers produced were{beef, lamb} and{wool.
